actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To prohibit the importation of goods from any country that does not adhere to certain standards with respect to the employment of minorities, older individuals, and individuals with disabilities.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation of goods into the United States from a country that does not adhere to specified standards respecting the employment of minorities and older or disabled individuals. Requires the United States Trade Representative to determine each importing country's adherence to such standards.

titles.title: To prohibit the importation of goods from any country that does not adhere to certain standards with respect to the employment of minorities, older individuals, and individuals with disabilities.
